NOTE: I will only read encrypted online communication from unknown people. All unencrypted attempts to communicate with me will be ignored. So, please encrypt (and sign) your emails to me using my PGP key and encrypt IM chats using OTR. 

Guides on Encryption
=====================

OTR
-----

Here is good and easy to follow guide on how to setup OTR on your computer(Linux/Windows): [Secure Instant Messaging with OTR](https://help.riseup.net/en/otr)

You can also use the following OTR supporting IM clients for other platforms/devices:
* [Gibberbot](https://guardianproject.info/apps/gibber/) for Android
* [Chatsecure](https://chatsecure.org/) for iOS
* [Audium](https://adium.im/) for OSX

PGP
----

As for sending me encrypted emails, here is an article that explains some of the key concepts of encrypted email: [Encrypting your email](https://help.riseup.net/en/encrypted-email)  

Here is a short tutorial on how to use OpenPGP (also known as GnuPG or GPG) on your computer: [Primer on using OpenPGP keys](https://help.riseup.net/en/howto-gpg-keys)  

And finally a tutorial on how to use Thunderbird to encrypt emails using the keys you generated by following the steps in the above tutorial: [Encrypting email with Thunderbird](https://help.riseup.net/en/encrypting-email-with-thunderbird)

I hope the following tutorials will help you setup your computer/phone to securely communicate with me and others.
